entry.value: # libraries required%%00010library(imp4p)%%00010%%00010# data input (columns)%%00010rframe <- knime.in%%00010frame <- data.matrix(rframe)%%00010%%00010# exclude rows containing NA values only%%00010#frame[rowSums(is.na(frame)) < ncol(frame),]%%00010frame<- frame[!(rowSums(is.na(frame))==NCOL(frame)),] %%00010%%00010# copy of the frame because of dimnames appending in the end... maybe dimnames would be enough, CHECK%%00010copy<- frame%%00010%%00010# data matrix must be numbers only, so attributes {dimnames} must be deleted%%00010dimnames(frame) <- NULL%%00010%%00010# factors indicating experimental conditions. Strsplit function allows separation of user-given experimental design by","%%00010NA_conditions <- strsplit(knime.flow.in[["NA_condition"]],",")%%00010NA_conditions_F <- as.factor(NA_conditions[[1]])%%00010%%00010# factors indicating biological replicates %%00010# default value is NULL. If user provides any design, it is converted to factors%%00010if (knime.flow.in[["NA_repbio"]] != "NULL") {%%00010NA_repbio <- strsplit(knime.flow.in[["NA_repbio"]],",")%%00010NA_repbio_F <- as.factor(NA_repbio[[1]])%%00010} else {%%00010%%00009NA_repbio_F <- NULL%%00010}%%00010%%00010# factors indicating technical replicates%%00010# default value is NULL. If user provides any design, it is converted to factors%%00010if (knime.flow.in[["NA_reptech"]] != "NULL") {%%00010NA_reptech <- strsplit(knime.flow.in[["NA_reptech"]],",")%%00010NA_reptech_F <- as.factor(NA_reptech[[1]])%%00010} else {%%00010%%00009NA_reptech_F <- NULL%%00010}%%00010%%00010# creating a list containing both data matrix and factors%%00010data_list<- list(%%00009dat.obs=frame, %%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009conditions=NA_conditions_F,%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009repbio= NA_repbio_F,%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009reptech= NA_reptech_F%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009)%%00010%%00010# imputation function via impute.mi%%00010final <- impute.mi(tab=data_list$dat.obs, conditions=data_list$conditions, repbio=data_list$NA_repbio_F, reptech=data_list$NA_reptech_F, %%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009nb.iter=knime.flow.in[["nb_iter"]], %%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009nknn=knime.flow.in[["nknn"]], %%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009selec="all",%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009siz="all",%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009q=0.95,%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009q.min=knime.flow.in[["q_min"]],%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009q.norm=knime.flow.in[["q_norm"]],%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009eps=knime.flow.in[["eps"]],%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009progress.bar=FALSE%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009)%%00010%%00010#attributes names put back%%00010#dimnames(final$tab.imp) <- dimnames(copy)%%00010%%00010#dimnames(final$tab.imp)[[2]]<- paste('imp',dimnames(final$tab.imp)[[2]], collapse='_')%%00010%%00010#Simulating data%%00010knime.out <- final%%00010%%00010%%00010%%00010

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
